name: E.L.E. Asteroids Pico 8
description:
Defend the earth from asteroids by rotating the launcher and firing missiles. You can score by destroying the asteroids.

this is the demake pico 8 version of my game Extinction Level Event: Asteroids game for android devices

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.juandeskgames.android.eleasteroids

Controls:

Left and Right arrow - rotates the missile launcher(yellow line)

z key - fires the missile

x key - starts the game
